doc.after: Nigeria is the 12th largest producer of petroleum in the world and the 8th largest exporter and has the 10th largest proven reserves The country joined OPEC in 1971 Petroleum plays a large role in the Nigerian economy accounting for 40 of GDP and 80 of Government earnings However agitation for better resource control in the Niger Delta its main oil producing region has led to disruptions in oil production and prevents the country from exporting at 100 capacity 111
